entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 11:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: S 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
